item.title: Worklog
item.description: Week 1: Orientation & Project Setup Week 2: Core AWS Basics & Project Planning Week 3: System Design & Intermediate AWS Services Week 4: Authentication Development & API Foundations Week 5: User Service Development & Scaling Concepts Week 6: Database & Caching Integration Week 7: Advanced Services & Deployment Preparation Week 8: Experimental Implementation & Deployment Week 9: Focused on writing unit tests for key components and functions, performing integration tests for core business flows, and ensuring overall system stability through continuous testing and bug fixing

item.title: Proposal
item.description: Multi-Region SaaS Task Management Platform A Global AWS Solution for Low-Latency, Resilient Collaboration 1. Executive Summary The Multi-Region SaaS Task Management Platform is designed to deliver a Trello/Asana-like experience with low latency, high availability, and regional scalability across Asia-Pacific.

item.title: Translated Blogs
item.description: Blog 1: Một giải pháp có khả năng mở rộng cao cho việc sao chép dữ liệu, sử dụng Amazon FSx for NetApp ONTAP và NetApp SnapMirror. Blog 2: Tăng tốc Đổi mới Hàng không Vũ trụ: High Performance Computing (HPC) trên Amazon Web Services (AWS) Blog 3: Khắc phục sự cố Môi trường Elastic Beanstalk bằng Amazon Q Developer CLI Blog 4: Triển khai liên tục dựa trên phương pháp GitOps với ArgoCD và EKS bằng cách sử dụng ngôn ngữ tự nhiên
